subject: RE: DID YOU AUTHORISE CAMIL TO OBTAIN YOUR FUND?
body:
Federal Bureau of Investigation Headquarters
935 Pennsylvania Avenue NW, Washington, DC 20535,
United States


Attention: Kimberly



I, The Director Fund Recovery Team officially writes to acknowledged your quick response towards the claims of your payment fund and the investigation is ongoing and we have sent out signal to INTERPOL Joint Task Force to track down Mr. Camil Ezttl's and his group who changed your data's information in your payment file and get them arrested. As matter of urgency there are different accounts submitted for your payment reflection as your representatives from Austria Republic by Mr. Camil Ezttl.


Please, you are hereby required to verify the following immediately:-

1. Did you AUTHORISE one Mr. CAMIL ZETTL of Austria whose Passport Photograph is hereby attached below to claim and receive the payment on your behalf?

2. Did you sign any "Deed of Assignment" in his favor? Thereby making him the current beneficiary with the following account details:
3. Bank: AUSTRIAN ANADI BANK
4. Bank Address: Bank address: 10. Oktoberstrasse 17, 9560 Feldkirchen
5. IBAN: AT23 5200 0004 5601 3651
6. Account Name: CAMIL ZETTL

You are required as a matter of urgency to confirm the legitimacy of the above claim and kindly give us reason why you decided to affect the above Change of Account. If you are not aware of this claim, please confirm to us immediately by contacting us via email very urgently for legal action to be carried out and immediate arrest of those involved will be carried out.


Due to the long delay this payment has suffered, be rest assured that immediately these payment irregularities are cleared, you would receive your fund immediately through the certified approved payment bank from us.

Note that we are bound to recognize Mr. Camil Ezttl's claim, if you fail to promptly response/communicate to this inquiry following the Deed of Assignment he submitted to claim this payment. Make sure you get back to me as soon as possible so that the necessary action will be taking immediately without further any further delay.


Remember, due to sensitivity of this transaction and investigation , you have to keep it as secret and confidential, not to be discussed or copy our conversations to a third party for security reasons and because it will fail our investigation in other to get those who are involved arrested.


Yours In Service
Mr. Paul Abbate
Deputy Director of FBI
D.L +1 (562) 930 1551

subject: Re: RE: DID YOU AUTHORISE CAMIL TO OBTAIN YOUR FUND?
body:
Hello Mr. Paul Abbate,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the claims of my payment fund. I appreciate your efforts in investigating this matter. Can you provide more details on how the INTERPOL Joint Task Force is involved in tracking down Mr. Camil Ezttl and his group? How can I assist in verifying the legitimacy of the claims made by Mr. Camil Ezttl?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Kimberly

subject: Re: RE: DID YOU AUTHORISE CAMIL TO OBTAIN YOUR FUND?
body:
Hello Mr. Paul Abbate,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the claims of my payment fund. I appreciate your efforts in investigating this matter. I would like to clarify that I did not authorize Mr. Camil Zettl of Austria to claim or receive any payment on my behalf, nor did I sign any Deed of Assignment in his favor.

I am concerned about the unauthorized changes made to my payment file and will cooperate with you to resolve this issue promptly. Could you please provide more details on how we can proceed with verifying the legitimacy of the claim and ensuring that the correct payment is processed to me?

I look forward to your guidance on this matter and appreciate your assistance in resolving it.

Best wishes,
Kimberly

subject: Re: DID YOU AUTHORISE CAMIL TO OBTAIN YOUR FUND?
body:
Federal Bureau of Investigation Headquarters
935 Pennsylvania Avenue NW, Washington, DC 20535,
United States


Attention: Kimberly
Code (2345)


I, The Director Fund Recovery Team officially writes to acknowledged your quick response towards the claims of your payment fund and the investigation is ongoing while we have send out signal to INTERPOL joint task force to track down Mr. Camil Ezttl's and his group who changed your data's information in your payment file and get them arrested.


After an executive crucial close door meeting this afternoon in conjunction with the Management of the US-Bank and Federal Reserve Bank, it was resolved and agreed that the US-BANK will work extensively to ensure that your payment fund of US$10,500,000.00 will be settled without any hassle.


For security reasons, An account will open on your behalf with the US-Bank Foreign Exchange and the payment fund will be deposited into the account on your name, this will enable only you to have direct control over your funds. We will monitor this payment ourselves to avoid the hopeless situation created by previous bank officials.


You are requested to contact the US-Bank by furnish them with the required data's needed bellow and forward it to the bank via email address bellow, which will enable them to start the payment approval process and account opening on your name. 

1. Your Full Name: 
2. Address: 
3. Telephone Numbers:
4: Identification ID:


Please you are advise to contact (Mrs. Reza Jessica Renee) immediately with the completed above data's and forward it to the bellow email address .


Email: info@us-bankgroup.com
Contact Person: Mrs. Reza Jessica Renee
Tel: +1 (612) 399 9939


Note: Due to sensitivity of this transaction and the ongoing investigation to track the imposters down in Austria and his Group round the World, You have to keep this conversations as top secret and confidential, not to be discuss or involve a third party for security reasons that will fail our investigations. Our eyes will be on your email and telephone line to know when you go against the instructions. Starting from today any email message or telephone conversation that did not mention the Security Code (2345) is not from the rightful channels. So when sending message to the US-Bank from today, make use of the code and any email that did not have this code must not be respond by you after you have send your Data's to US-Bank. 


We shall be looking forward to hear from you soon.


Yours In Service
Mr. Paul Abbate
Director Fund Recovery Team
D.L +1 562 930 1551

subject: Re: DID YOU AUTHORISE CAMIL TO OBTAIN YOUR FUND?
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds like there have been some security issues with your payment fund, but it's great to hear that steps are being taken to resolve the situation. Can you tell me more about how the account opening process works with the Foreign Exchange? I'm curious to learn more about how this will help ensure the safety of my funds.

Best wishes,
Kimberly
